Major_Arcs.title: Arrival and Initial Conflicts in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the woman's arrival in Ghost Town, her desperate attempts to explain her situation to the town's inhabitants, and the discovery of modern airport plans threatening the town's historical nature.

sub_scenes.title: Explaining the Unbelievable in Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: The woman arrives in Ghost Town and tries to explain her situation to various men, encountering skepticism and frustration.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Explanations in Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Airport Plans and the Woman's Outrage
sub_scenes.description: The woman overhears plans to build an airport in Ghost Town and confronts the men involved, expressing her horror and attachment to the town's history.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Airport Plans and Confrontation in Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Tensions and Realizations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the evolving relationship between the woman and Cal, their misunderstandings, and the revelation of Cal's 'real offer' in the blasted desert, leading to a confrontation at the work site.

sub_scenes.title: Understanding and Shifting Focus with Cal
sub_scenes.description: The woman and Cal discuss their relationship, moving from misunderstandings to a deeper understanding, and Cal hints at a significant offer.

narrative_arcs.title: The Real Offer in the Blasted Desert

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at the Work Site and Unease
sub_scenes.description: The woman and Cal arrive at a construction site in the blasted desert, where she encounters and interacts with the workers, sensing a building tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Work Site and Confrontation with Workers

Major_Arcs.title: Business and Family Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details business discussions about horses and the airport, alongside family conflicts involving Nan and her father, and Nan's emotional turmoil and search for comfort.

sub_scenes.title: Horse Transportation and Airport Business
sub_scenes.description: Characters discuss plans for horse transportation via the airport and the financial aspects of renting horses to construction workers.

narrative_arcs.title: Helping Construction Workers and Crazy Notions

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Humiliation and Emotional Distress
sub_scenes.description: Nan faces her father's harsh reprimands and spanking threats, leading to emotional breakdown and seeking solace in her room.

narrative_arcs.title: Solace in Tears and Maid's Comfort

sub_scenes.title: Advice and Confrontation in Nan's Room
sub_scenes.description: Nan receives advice from her mother and maid about love and patience with Cal, leading to Nan's decision to confront Cal directly.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother's Advice on Love and Patience
Maid's Practical Advice and Cal's Love

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Business, and Commitment
sub_scenes.description: Nan chases Cal for answers, transitions to discussing business and a deal, showing a mix of personal and professional urgency.

narrative_arcs.title: Desperate Chase and Plea for Attention
Yore Dad's Deal and No Backing Down

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her emotions to Cal, who acknowledges them but focuses on business, leading to his departure and Nan's reflection on his absence.

sub_scenes.title: Confession of Feelings and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Cal returns, revealing he followed Nan to confess his feelings, leading to a moment of vulnerability and emotional resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Aid
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the onset of a severe snowstorm, its devastating impact on cattle, and the community's hopeful response with an airlift operation.

sub_scenes.title: Affection, Foreboding, and Weather Warning
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal express affection amidst a narrator's foreshadowing of trouble, followed by the arrival of Mr. Wills with a grim weather report.

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Hope in the Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: Characters express concern and despair over the relentless snowfall, but a sudden sound of a plane brings hope and relief with an airlift of fodder.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of Hope: Arrival of the Plane

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson's Introduction and Jeff's Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson through a public fight and focuses on Jeff's critical perspective and escalating conflict with Sally regarding his brother Clyde's influence.

sub_scenes.title: Cowtown Showdown and Public Opinion
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's forceful nature is introduced in a public fight, eliciting varied reactions from townspeople.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Critical Opinion of Chane Benson
Sally and Older Man's More Mature Perspective on Chane Benson

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Gun Handling and Escalating Argument with Sally
sub_scenes.description: Sally confronts Jeff about his hero worship of his brother and his gun handling, leading to a heated argument and implied threats of violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Hero Worship and Questioning Gun Handling

Major_Arcs.title: Clyde, Sally, and Benson's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Sally and Clyde's relationship amidst the threat posed by Benson, Clyde's defiant articles, and the escalating tensions leading to a dinner invitation.

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Introduction of Benson Story
sub_scenes.description: Sally and Clyde reassure each other about Jeff, while Mr. Benson is introduced telling a story about 'Chane Benson'.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Commitment to Change Jeff
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Storytelling

sub_scenes.title: Article Accusation and Benson's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Sally confronts Clyde about an article, warns him about Benson, and Benson himself intervenes to reassure them.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Denial about the Article
Benson's Declaration to Stay and Fight Killers

sub_scenes.title: Threats, Defiance, and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: Surrett is threatened, Clyde remains defiant despite Sally's fears, and a dinner invitation to Benson is extended as a conciliatory gesture.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Defiant Articles and Public Reaction

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner's Aftermath and Benson's Downfall
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the tense dinner with Benson, its violent aftermath, and the resolution of the conflict with Benson leaving town.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Charm and Jeff's Accusation
sub_scenes.description: The dinner transitions to a moonlit scene where Benson flirts with Jeff's sister, leading to Jeff's angry accusations and Benson's sinister intentions revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: End of Dinner and Moonlight Charm

sub_scenes.title: Violence and Standoff with Benson
sub_scenes.description: Benson's aggression escalates to physical assault on Jeff, followed by a chase and a tense gun standoff with Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath of Benson Conflict
sub_scenes.description: The standoff resolves with Benson leaving town, followed by reflections, remorse, and a return to newspaper work.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution of the Standoff and Benson's Departure
Reflecting on Tension and Expressing Remorse
Headline Change, Relief, and Newspaper Work

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Betsy and Range War
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Betsy, Steve Daley, and the escalating conflict of the range war, setting up the central conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy Confrontation and Bodyguard Introduction
sub_scenes.description: A tense cowboy confrontation is followed by the introduction of Steve Daley as Betsy's newly hired bodyguard.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley as Bodyguard

sub_scenes.title: Clarifying Steve's Role and Range War Discussion
sub_scenes.description: Steve's role is clarified to Betsy, and the conversation shifts to the ongoing range war and its specific troubles.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion of Range War and Underlying Troubles

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Range War and Steve's Fight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalation of the range war with a direct confrontation and fight, and observers reacting to Steve's fighting skills.

sub_scenes.title: Store Departure and Daley Observation
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve leave the store, and Steve reveals his observation of Daley's watchful behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure from the Store and Daley's Observation
Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Hired Hand
Observations on Steve's Skills and Impending Danger

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision on Steve's Role and Maverick's Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Betsy decides Steve can stay but not as a gunslinger, followed by Maverick expressing gratitude for her actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Maverick's Observation and Question to Betsy
Hank Defends Steve and Maverick's Suggestion

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the romantic development of Betsy and Steve, culminating in Steve giving up his gun for her.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Condition and Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: Betsy sets a condition for Steve's job, leading to her sudden confession of love and a romantic turning point.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Dilemma and Betsy's Confession of Love
Steve's Ultimate Proof of Love and Betsy's Acceptance

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Range War and Betsy's Defiance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the escalating range war conflict with threats from Old Man Bridges and Betsy's defiant stance against violence.

sub_scenes.title: Old Man Bridges' Complaint and Confrontation with Hank
sub_scenes.description: Old Man Bridges complains to Betsy and Steve and then confronts Hank about trespassing.

narrative_arcs.title: Bridges Confronts Hank and Accuses Trespassing

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Defiance and Revelation of Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve prepare for confrontation, with Betsy revealing her defiance and recounting the ambush at Devil's Pass.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy and Steve Prepare for Confrontation
Betsy Justifies Gun Violence as Necessary
Betsy Recounts the Ambush and Loss of Horses
Aftermath of the Ambush and Hank's Escape

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy's Resolve and Conflict with Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Betsy's firm decision to use guns, her confrontation with Steve over violence, and her ride towards Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision for Violence and Steve's Ultimatum
sub_scenes.description: Betsy resolves to use guns, leading to an argument with Steve and his ultimatum.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Gunfire Encounter

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Shooting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the violent confrontation at Devil's Pass, the shooting incident, and the immediate aftermath.

sub_scenes.title: Warning and Gunfight at Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at Devil's Pass, Steve's warning about danger, and the outbreak of a gunfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Warning

Major_Arcs.title: Dave and Rancher's Daughter Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new conflict involving Dave and the Rancher's Daughter, and the threat from Bear Fenin.

sub_scenes.title: Rancher's Daughter's Refusal and Bear Fenin Threat
sub_scenes.description: Rancher's daughter refuses to leave with Dave, and the threat of Bear Fenin's arrival is introduced.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern over Curley and Bear Fenin's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Fence Dispute and Escalation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the fence dispute with Fred Gordon, escalating from verbal confrontation to expulsion.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Confrontation and Cattle Concerns
sub_scenes.description: Rancher and daughter confront Fred Gordon about a fence blocking water access, while others worry about cattle.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Fred's Conflicted Relationship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Carrie and Fred's conflicted relationship, marked by past guilt, sarcasm, and an unexpected marriage proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Reflection, Guilt, and Initial Interaction
sub_scenes.description: Reflection on past apologies and guilt, followed by Carrie and Dave's conversation and Carrie's reluctance to discuss Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Past Apologies and Lingering Resentment
Carrie's Reluctance to Discuss Fred and Preference for Dave

sub_scenes.title: Sarcasm, Truce, and Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation between Carrie and Fred, sarcastic exchange, tentative truce, and a surprising marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Confrontation and Demand to Leave Dave Alone
Reflection on Love and a Marriage Proposal

Major_Arcs.title: Deception and Business Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Carrie's realization of Fred's deception, her confrontation with him, and then with Mr. Carlton in his office.

sub_scenes.title: Realization of Deception and Confrontation with Fred
sub_scenes.description: Carrie realizes Fred's proposal is tied to the Carlton contract and confronts him about his deception.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Deception and Contract Motive
Night of Reflection and Business Meeting

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation in Carlton's Office and Surrender
sub_scenes.description: Carrie confronts Mr. Carlton in his office and then makes a surprising declaration of surrender to Fred.

Major_Arcs.title: Farewell to Fred and Confession to Dave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Carrie's angry farewell to Fred, her reunion with Dave, and a flashback revealing her father's advice.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Farewell and Town Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Carrie angrily breaks up with Fred and then meets Dave in town after weeks of separation.

Major_Arcs.title: Revelation and Romantic Resolution with Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Carrie's illness, the revelation of Fred's honorable actions regarding the contract, and their romantic reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Illness and Urgent Message
sub_scenes.description: Carrie's illness, a visit from her father and Dave, and Mr. Carlton's urgent message.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reunion and Climax
sub_scenes.description: Carrie's emotional reaction, joyful ride to Bar C, and romantic reunion with Fred culminating in a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Shame, Regret, and Joyful Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris's Troubled Reunion and Separation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's injured arrival at Chris's room, the revelation of his bullet wound, and their separation due to legal troubles.

sub_scenes.title: Injured Dirk's Arrival and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: Injured Dirk seeks Chris, a flashback to their earlier meeting, and a doctor diagnoses Dirk's bullet wound.

narrative_arcs.title: Past Encounter - Dirk and Chris Meet

sub_scenes.title: Sheriff's Investigation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Concern for Dirk leads to an investigation plan, and the Sheriff arrives, initiating a ranch search and confrontation with Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Dirk and Investigation Plan
Sheriff Arrives and Identifies Chris & Dirk's Trail

sub_scenes.title: Arrest and Plea for Delay
sub_scenes.description: Marshal Cready questions Chris and Dirk, leading to Dirk's arrest and Chris's plea for a delay due to his injuries.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Delay and Conditional Stay

sub_scenes.title: Love Confession and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Chris confesses her love to Marshal Cready, followed by escape plans for Dirk and Dirk's arrest.

Major_Arcs.title: Pursuit, Shooting, and Separation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the pursuit of Dirk, the violent confrontation leading to Chris's shooting, and Dirk's escape to Mexico followed by their separation.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Pursuit and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Discovery of pursuit and a flashback explaining their evasion efforts throughout the night.

sub_scenes.title: Escape to Mexico and Chris's Return
sub_scenes.description: Escape to Mexico, Dirk's farewell, and Chris's decision to return to Rance despite Dirk's safety.

narrative_arcs.title: Fleeing the Scene and Bandaging Wounds
Escape to Mexico and Criminal Escape
Return to Rance and Confession of Love
Concern for Rance and Separate Paths
Arrival in Mexico and Uncertain Reunion

Major_Arcs.title: Rance's Recovery and Wedding Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Rance's recovery, the romantic reunion with Chris, and their wedding despite past conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Rance's unconsciousness and recovery, Chris attending to him, and their reunion upon his awakening.

narrative_arcs.title: Inquiry About Business and Father's Opinion

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Wedding plans, Chris's vows and fears, the wedding day dawns, and Dirk's unexpected arrival disrupts the ceremony.

narrative_arcs.title: Vows and Fears Before the Wedding
Backstory of the Man and Rance's Support
